note: Before Justin began on the path of becoming an audio book narrator, his journey took him from the US Air Force, to Cyber Security, showcasing his broad skill set and adaptability. Since 2015, his passion for storytelling has driven him into a diverse array of genres, using his voice to bring characters and vivid narratives to life. This commitment reflects his deep appreciation for connecting with audiences through stories. Off the mic, you can find Justin playing Disc Golf at his local course.

fields.name: My Brand
fields.value: Whiskey with a hint of beardly wisdom
